title: Why was lee sin not included in the assassin 'rework'?
body:
I don't see why he wasn't included

His whole kit is pretty much an assassins kit

replies.body:
Because he is blind.....Riot Meddler instructed him to go to the rework department on the left side of the corridor and wait his turn. He went passed it and into the women bathroom. 

Totally not his fault. Riot Meddler should have hold him by the hand and made sure he was in the correct line.
He can 100-0 with less counterplay than most assassins now if he catches you and builds for it, he also has mobilty af so i i think he is more than a diver fighter to be honest.

didnt know he was an assassin
